name: REVENGE: REMAKE
description:
REVENGE, The critically acclaimed off fangame made by (literally who) has been given a face lift! explore hidden maps and zones! all new characters, story, weapons and more! featuring (but not limited to) new combat, zones, features and "runtiming" (it's my word)

Due to the "SECRET" nature of REVENGE and more specifically the much better remake, most files are hidden from view on a first playthrough as to not spoil the contents of the game! download the game below and GET playing!

(i made it i made it all)
